backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining content types, storage maps, preview workflow, access control, and mixed-in blob storage for images and site data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting removal of a Home page CTA section and listing affected frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS layer defining OKLCH-based red-white-black theme variables and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon, preload, fonts, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component setting up TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Reusable logo component rendering the brand image with optional text and error fallback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing contact info, about text, social links, attribution, and dynamic content from backend with preview support.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links and a Contact Us button that triggers smooth scrolling to the footer section.
frontend/src/components/HomeGallerySecti: Displays featured gallery images with loading and empty states, linking to the full gallery.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main page layout with header, footer, preview banner, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/PreviewBanner.ts: Shows a draft-content preview banner for admins with an option to exit preview mode.
frontend/src/constants/brandAssets.ts: Exports the canonical unmodifiable brand logo path.
frontend/src/constants/missionAssets.ts: Empty constants file reserved for mission-related asset paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactScroll.ts: Provides utilities to scroll to the contact section, including deferred scrolling after navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, client creation, and context exposure.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreviewMode.ts: Handles preview mode state based on URL parameters and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as courses, gallery images, reviews, and contact info.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for the appâ€™s dark theme and accent colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing courses, gallery images, reviews, contact info, and homepage content with CRUD forms and preview mode.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page showing contact info and a form for international inquiries with social links and dynamic content.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays courses grouped by category with loading skeletons and styled category sections.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Renders gallery images in a responsive grid with loading states and fallback sample images.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, highlights, review submission, gallery section, and dynamic content from backend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requirements, architectural notes, and current state for the HR ACADEMY site.
